last_episode_to_air.name: Always Be Closing
last_episode_to_air.overview: In Minneapolis, Pigeon Vision unveils a customized predator drone which shoots paintballs; a customized drone for Tyler Perry prompts him to give everyone a tour of his ranch and his fleet of RC aircraft and drones.

name: Droned
overview: "Droned" follows Pigeon Vision, a Fort Lauderdale based, family owned, aerial filming and drone customization company, whose business gives them access to innovative technology, high end celebrity clients, and travel adventures to amazing locales. The docu-series follows the eccentric, adrenaline junkie team, as they bring tomorrow's drone technology to use today. Each episode showcases Pigeon Vision tackling a client's challenging project, breathtaking highlights from each beautiful destination, and unique recreational activities. The projects regularly focus on using the latest drones, customizing to meet a request and filming aerial footage from challenging physical locations.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: "Droned" follows Pigeon Vision, a Fort Lauderdale based, family owned, aerial filming and drone customization company, whose business gives them access to innovative technology, high end celebrity clients, and travel adventures to amazing locales. The docu-series follows the eccentric, adrenaline junkie team, as they bring tomorrow's drone technology to use today.  Each episode showcases Pigeon Vision tackling a client's challenging project, breathtaking highlights from each beautiful destination, and unique recreational activities. The projects regularly focus on using the latest drones, customizing to meet a request and filming aerial footage from challenging physical locations.

episodes.name: Water World
episodes.overview: Pigeon Vision is waterborne, with Dani and Ryan teaming up with the Marine Search & Rescue Department at Fort Lauderdale Fire Department's Station 49, one of the busiest stations in all of Florida, to test a drone that can save multiple victims stranded in deep water. Ryan and Bill develop an autonomous long-distance drone that can locate deep sea trophy fish including tuna, marlin, and swordfish

episodes.name: Silicon Beach
episodes.overview: Pigeon Vision heads to Los Angeles to film an action packed chase scene with three of the world's top parkour/free-running athletes and help a sailboat race crew improve their performance. While in town, Ryan helps social media phenomenon Brock O'Hurn film new content, and Roger visits a cutting edge virtual reality game developer.

episodes.name: Vertigo
episodes.overview: The crew uses a heavy-duty drone to film snowboarding and cliff-walking.

episodes.name: Catch Me If You Can
episodes.overview: Dani prepares for a drone race by building and testing a specialized drone; she trains with a professional racer who has competed in a high-stakes drone race in Dubai.

episodes.name: Swimming with Sharks
episodes.overview: The team receives a request for a drone which can locate and track sharks off of the Bahamas; Pigeon Vision plans to use a prototype drone programmed to identify sharks with imaging technology.

episodes.name: Miami Heat
episodes.overview: Drones follow Juan Pablo Montoya as he tests a supercharged RC Jet which tears through the sky with speeds reaching over 150 mph.

episodes.name: What Happens in Vegas
episodes.overview: Criss Angel invites the team to his private magic facility to shoot a drone open; Pigeon Vision gets exclusive drone access to the Ghostbar Day Party in Las Vegas.

episodes.name: Into the Wild
episodes.overview: The crew heads to Florida to track feral hogs by using a thermal camera.

episodes.name: Festival of Speed
episodes.overview: A drone company films the Festival of Speed, a motor sports event that includes superbike, rally car, and monster truck races.

episodes.name: Always Be Closing
episodes.overview: In Minneapolis, Pigeon Vision unveils a customized predator drone which shoots paintballs; a customized drone for Tyler Perry prompts him to give everyone a tour of his ranch and his fleet of RC aircraft and drones.
